articles.description: The 51 coronavirus cases in Karnataka include one death and three persons who have been discharged
articles.content:
Ten new cases of COVID-19 have been confirmed in Karnataka on March 25 taking the total number of cases to 51.
Although Health Minister B. Sriramulu tweeted on March 25 morning that a woman from Gowribidanur who tested positive after returning from Mecca suc… [+1583 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Coronavirus | World chess body postpones Olympaid to 2021
articles.description: The Olympiad and the FIDE Congress, slated to be held in August in Moscow and Khanty-Mansiysk respectively, are rescheduled to the summer of 2021 at the same locations
articles.content:
The world governing body of chess, FIDE, has postponed the Olympiad, scheduled for August 5-17 in Moscow, to 2021 owing to the COVID-19 pandemic.
 The global chess body issued a statement saying that the Olympiad and the FIDE Congress, slated to be held in A… [+1765 chars]

articles.author: IANS
articles.title: Coronavirus | Bundesliga set to be suspended till April 30
articles.description: Over 18,000 people have lost their lives so far due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
articles.content:
German football league Bundesliga is all set to be suspended till April 30 amid the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
The Executive Committee is aware that all scenarios and options for action also depend on external factors, over which the DFL and clubs have no… [+836 chars]

articles.title: How practitioners of different art forms are coping as all cultural programmes have been cancelled due to the Coronavirus lockdown
articles.description: The artistes speak about how they have been affected and what they are doing during this period

articles.title: Coronavirus | Relief camp at Mustafabad cleared
articles.description: The step has been taken in the wake of novel coronavirus outbreak to ensure safety of people, officials said
articles.content:
The Idgah relief camp in north-east Delhis Mustafabad, which was set up by the Waqf Board for riot victims, was on Wednesday morning cleared completely.

articles.title: Coronavirus | Patient data from Singapore & South Korea shows physical distancing is the only option
articles.description: In many countries, often all it took for the novel virus to spread was one infected person who didn't maintain physical distance

articles.author: Nikhil M Babu
articles.title: ‘Coronavirus is on my mind, but we have to serve homeless people’
articles.description: For 21-year-old Pramod Kumar, outbreak of virus has only increased his workload
articles.content: The workload of many have reduced since the outbreak of COVID-19 and people are working in the safety of homes. But for 21-year-old Pramod Kumar, who works as a caretaker at a government-run night shelter for the homeless, work and risk have only increased. … [+1378 chars]
